[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1592921666115{margin-bottom: -20px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/homepage-header-e1591132115768.jpg?id=24277) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592922179715{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”custom-hero-aaron”]

ESTABLISHED IN 2006

NEW YORK CITY SEO

We offer a full range of in-house digital marketing services.

SCHEDULE A PHONE CALL TODAY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1568142175582{padding-top: 4% !important;padding-bottom: 4% !important;background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572574804440{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

If you landed on this SEO page, you most likely did a Google search for New York City SEO. You found A Nerd’s World because we practice what we preach and understand the most important ranking factors on Google.  With our custom approach to SEO, Google ranks us first and we offer the same service for your business.  Contact us today for a free New York City SEO audit and an in-person consultation.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1567702160522{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_id=”the-king”]

KING OF SEO IN NEW YORK CITY

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Chris A. Hughes a.k.a. The King Of Search Engine Optimization is a Canadian born business magnate, world-renowned online digital marketer and entrepreneur extraordinaire.

In the early 2000s, Chris led the expansion of the organic marketing industry and continues to be seen as one of the world’s foremost expert in SEO, branding and website development today.

During his time developing the internet-marketing industry, Chris accrued substantial profits from his internet & technology businesses. By age 27, Chris became a self-made millionaire selling t-shirts online.

Today, Chris is the founder of A Nerd’s World – a global web development company with over 4000 websites built for local and international clients in over 50+ countries. Together, Chris and his team of SEO nerds have helped hundreds of businesses both big and small rank #1 on Google.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1537453930568{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/seo-toronto-stats.jpg?id=24032) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

NEW YORK CITY SEO HELPS PUT MORE EYES ON YOUR SITE AND THAT MEANS MORE TRAFFIC, LEADS, CLIENTS AND PROFIT.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

In today’s hyperconnected world and highly competitive business environment, it’s crucial for a business to be able to reach its target audience online with its core message, products and services or latest promotions.

This is where Search Engine Optimization (SEO) comes in. If done right, and in combination with other online marketing and technical strategies, SEO can help your business get great rankings and land on the front page of Google’s search. The first page of Google receives 95% of all website traffic, while only 5% of users make it to the second page.  You really need your business or organization to rank as high as possible on search engines to reach your full potential online.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_btn title=”FREE NEW YORK CITY SEO CONSULTATION” style=”custom” custom_background=”#00b9ff” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”left” link=”|||” el_class=”open-seo-pop”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1568221192627{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

 NEW YORK CITY SEO FREE LESSONS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A Nerd’s World is led by an experienced managing team of SEO veterans that founded the company on the principle of providing honest and outstanding online search engine optimization.  We guarantee that our SEO strategies will deliver real results for our clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”18px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

SEO FOR DUMMIES:
INTRODUCTION TO SEO
(PART 1)

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

Are the keywords that you want to rank for actually on your page? Are you worthy of a Google ranking? Are your website users enjoying your website and content? Are other websites of authority linking to you?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

SEO FOR DUMMIES
ON-PAGE SEO CHECKLIST
(PART 2)

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

When it comes to SEO, I’m sure you’ve heard enough about title tags and keyword density.  Here’s a simple SEO checklist that I’ve created that will bring in more search engine traffic from every piece of content that you create.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

HOW TO RANK #1 ON
GOOGLE: 7 STEPS TO
SEO SUCCESS

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

Most businesses understand the basic concepts of SEO and why it’s important. However, when it comes to executing a sound SEO strategy, Chris recommends reverse engineering the competition.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

HOW TO DO KEYWORD
RESEARCH FOR SEO:
BEGINNERS GUIDE

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

Keywords are ideas and topics that define what your website content is about. In terms of SEO, they’re the words and phrases that searchers enter into search engines, also called “search queries.”

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

DO IT YOURSELF
11 SIMPLE STEPS TO
RANKING ON GOOGLE

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

What is SEO? Search engine optimization (SEO) is the practice of increasing the quantity and quality of traffic to your website through organic search engine results.  Let ANW founder Chris teach you how.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

SEO FOR BEGINNERS:
3 EASY STEPS TO RANKING
#1 ON GOOGLE

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]

My 3 easy SEO steps to success: Create a gameplan (reverse engineer success) Create original content (create page & share page) Get backlinks (Web 2.0’s & Free Local Directories).

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537064914067{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”90px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572573520472{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

OUR NEW YORK CITY SEO CLIENTS LOVE WORKING WITH US

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572574863692{padding-top: 10px !important;}”]

We can’t stress it enough— we place unparalleled value on building long-term relationships, providing superb customer service and developing high-quality search engine optimization strategies for our clients. Our New York City SEO results speak volumes to our capablities and our clients love us!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1568220994088{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252284883{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration2 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23770″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]JERRY SIMON
Real Estate Agent[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280927981{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“Not all search engine optimization companies are the same! I say this because we’ve been through about 3 others and none provided the same level of service and communications as Chris and his team of nerds. If you’re willing to invest in an agency that actually delivers, this should be your go-to company.   They understand the importance of ROI, and always get results.

Phenomenal support since day one from this company. How could anyone not be satisfied with in depth, statistical reports every month, from an SEO company that actually cares. I’ve dealt with a lot of frauds so it is very relieving to have come across these nerds.
Thanks SEO Nerds!”

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”23836″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252280219{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration4 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23775″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]CHERYL BERNARD
Early Childhood Education[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280934691{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“If I could give ANW 6 stars I would! I have been very impressed with the results I am getting for my Organic searches. They have taken some of my key word searches from #24 to ranking #2 and have gotten me better results than all of my previous efforts and hard spent money.

Chris has been great. He always follows through with what he says he’s going to do and is always available for my questions and concerns on the phone or in-person.

I would definitely recommend A Nerd’s World for SEO to any business, except for one that is competing with me.”[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”23837″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252275187{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration6 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23778″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]BLAKE SHANNON
E-Commerce Business[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280942078{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“I could not be any happier with nerd’s world and their SEO team.

A few months ago I started a small business. As with most new businesses my Google ranking was next to nothing. I knew I needed help with my positioning on Google and decided to give nerd’s world a try for my SEO.  Boy am I glad I did!

Chris and his SEO team were extremely patient and pleasant to work with. They explained the entire process and they were easily reachable when I had questions. I began noticing higher rankings within 30-60 days and many of my keywords made it to the first page of Google.

Hiring them for SEO is one of the best decisions I’ve ever made for my new business. I can not recommend them enough! Thanks so much!”[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”23835″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
